synoptic.invariants
Interface ITemporalInvariant

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlwaysFollowedInvariant, AlwaysPrecedesInvariant, BinaryInvariant, NeverFollowedInvariant
public interface ITemporalInvariant

The interface all temporal synoptic.invariants must implement.

Author:
Sigurd Schneider

          Use Did/Can LTL instead of LTL.

Field Detail

useDIDCAN

static final boolean useDIDCAN
Use Did/Can LTL instead of LTL. (Not using it is only partially implemented.)

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getLTLString

java.lang.String getLTLString()
Get an LTL representation of the invariant.

Returns:
an string representing the invariant in LTL

shorten

<T extends INode<T>> java.util.List<T> shorten(java.util.List<T> path)
Shorten a counter-example for this invariant.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of nodes in the graph
Parameters:
path - the counter-example path
Returns:
a prefix of path that still violates the the property

getAutomaton

Graph getAutomaton()
Get the Buchi-automaton that corresponds to this LTL property. This method should cache the automaton.

Returns:
a Buchi-automaton represented as a graph

getRelation

java.lang.String getRelation()
Get the relation whose paths are constrained by this invariant.

Returns:
the relation occurring in this invariant

getPredicates

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPredicates()
Get the set of predicates occurring in this property. Predicates are here labels of states.

Returns:
a set of strings with the labels that occur in this invariant

getShortName

java.lang.String getShortName()
Get the short name of the invariant.

Returns:
a short invariant name
